Chapter Previous Next

class gstScaleManipulator : public gstManipulator

Scale manipulator. This uses the PHANToM to scale an object, with force feedback. When active, the manipulator generates a force effect as the object is scaled to allow gstPHANToM to scale a node with force feedback. The force effect is modeled as a mass attached to a spring and dashpot in parallel.

From header file: gstScaleManipulator.h
